rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: The entrance hall features a wide, wheelchair-accessible pathway with tactile flooring and minimal obstructions.

rooms.name: Lobby/Courtyard
rooms.description: An open-plan space blending indoor and outdoor living, with ample natural light and ventilation. Includes a small garden area.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: A functional, open-plan kitchen with built-in appliances and an integrated dining area. Layout optimized for wheelchair movement.

rooms.name: Living Room/Home Theater
rooms.description: Dual-purpose living area that transitions into a home theater with retractable screen and acoustically treated walls. Natural light during daytime.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Suite
rooms.description: Triplex studio apartment design with multifunctional space incorporating a sleeping area, workspace, and storage. Ensures ample natural light and open layout.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large, wheelchair-accessible entrance door with an adjoining ramp.

openings.name: Window Openings for Studio
openings.description: Strategically placed windows in the studio area to maximize natural light and ventilation. Compliant with Vastu principles by aligning with the east direction.

openings.name: Poolside Opening
openings.description: Large window/door opening providing direct access from the living room to the swimming pool area, enhancing natural light and ventilation.

special_features.description: A rectangular swimming pool integrated in the design with a shallow edge for safety, located near the living room for optimal view. Accessible via ramps.
A dedicated home theater zone within the living room, featuring retractable screen and soundproofing for immersive viewing.
